data_descriptor.name: rr_interval_list
data_descriptor.description: A list fo all the realizations of RR interval given in number of samples

data_descriptor.name: standard_deviation_heart_rate
data_descriptor.description: Standard deviation of heart rate within a minute

data_descriptor.description: A list of heart rate values within the minute calculated on window size = 8 seconds,window offset = 2 seconds

algorithm.description: Produces many realizations of RR interval timeseries in one minute alongside the corresponding standard deviation and Heart Rate
